mapper.select: SELECT USER_ADDR, BASIC_USER_SEX FROM BASIC_USER bu WHERE BASIC_USER_NO = #{basicUserNo}

SELECT b.BASIC_USER_NO, b.BASIC_USER_NICKNAME, b.BASIC_USER_BIRTHDATE, b.BASIC_USER_MBTI, b.CONSENT_LOCATION_INFO, ul.LATITUDE, ul.LONGITUDE, LISTAGG(DISTINCT hc.HOBBY_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY hc.HOBBY_NAME) AS hobby_name, LISTAGG(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.PERSONAL_TYPE = 'L' THEN pc.PERSONAL_NAME END, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY pc.PERSONAL_NAME) AS personal_like, LISTAGG(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.PERSONAL_TYPE = 'H' THEN pc.PERSONAL_NAME END, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY pc.PERSONAL_NAME) AS personal_hate, bp.PHOTO_ORIGIN_NAME, bp.PHOTO_NAME, bp.PHOTO_PATH, bp.PHOTO_INDATE FROM BASIC_USER b LEFT JOIN BASIC_USER_LOCATION ul ON b.BASIC_USER_NO = ul.BASIC_USER_NO LEFT JOIN BASIC_USER_HOBBY buh ON b.BASIC_USER_NO = buh.BASIC_USER_NO LEFT JOIN HOBBY_CATEGORY hc ON buh.HOBBY_NO = hc.HOBBY_NO LEFT JOIN BASIC_USER_PERSONAL bup ON b.BASIC_USER_NO = bup.BASIC_USER_NO LEFT JOIN PERSONAL_CATEGORY pc ON bup.PERSONAL_NO = pc.PERSONAL_NO LEFT JOIN BASIC_USER_PHOTO bp ON b.BASIC_USER_NO = bp.BASIC_USER_NO WHERE ul.LONGITUDE BETWEEN #{bounds.southLat} AND #{bounds.northLat} AND ul.LATITUDE BETWEEN #{bounds.southLng} AND #{bounds.northLng} AND b.BASIC_USER_STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
AND b.BASIC_USER_SEX = 'M'
AND b.BASIC_USER_SEX = 'F'
GROUP BY b.BASIC_USER_NO, b.BASIC_USER_NICKNAME, b.BASIC_USER_BIRTHDATE, b.BASIC_USER_MBTI, b.CONSENT_LOCATION_INFO, ul.LATITUDE, ul.LONGITUDE, bp.PHOTO_ORIGIN_NAME, bp.PHOTO_NAME, bp.PHOTO_PATH, bp.PHOTO_INDATE
